samples.instruction: Aadhaar Card-la mobile number maatra enna seiyyanum?
samples.current_output:
Online-la mudiyaadhu - Aadhaar Seva Kendra pooganum

Steps:
1. Nearest ASK find: uidai.gov.in тЖТ Locate Enrollment Center
2. Appointment book (optional): appointments.uidai.gov.in
3. Documents: Original Aadhaar + New mobile (active SIM with OTP capability)
4. At ASK: Form fill тЖТ Biometric verification тЖТ New mobile register
5. Fee: тВ╣50
6. Confirmation: SMS to new number

Important:
- Old number-la OTP varaadhu, biometric verification thaan
- 2-3 days-la update aagum
- Verify at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in

Needed when: FD/Investment in child's name, Child has income (Child Artist), Property in child's name. To apply: Parent/Guardian must apply, Need child's Birth Certificate + Parent's ID proof, Must update details (photo, signature) when turning 18

BPL роорпВродрпНрод роХрпБроЯро┐роороХрпНроХро│рпБроХрпНроХрпБ роЗро▓ро╡роЪ роЙродро╡ро┐ роЪро╛родройроЩрпНроХро│рпН. родроХрпБродро┐: 60+ ро╡ропродрпБ, BPL, Age-related disability роЙро│рпНро│ро╡ро░рпНроХро│рпН. Free Items: Walking stick, Elbow crutch, Walker, Tripod, Wheelchair, Hearing aid, Spectacles, Artificial dentures. ро╡ро┐рогрпНрогрокрпНрокроорпН: ALIMCO assessment camps (District-ро▓рпН announce роЪрпЖропрпНро╡ро╛ро░рпНроХро│рпН). Documents: Age proof, BPL card, Aadhaar.

Jan Aushadhi sells generic medicines with same quality as branded (WHO-GMP certified) at 50-90% lower price. No brand premium. Find stores at janaushadhi.gov.in. Example: Metformin 500mg - Market тВ╣25, Jan Aushadhi тВ╣3.50. Great for long-term medications.

тВ╣5 lakh free health insurance per family per year. Eligibility based on SECC 2011 BPL data. Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in. Get card FREE at govt hospital/CSC with Aadhaar + ration card. Covers 1,500+ procedures at empanelled hospitals. In TN, combined with CMCHIS.

Apply at chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in with property document, building plan, tax receipt, Aadhaar. Site inspection for feasibility. Charges: Connection тВ╣500-2,000, deposit тВ╣500-1,000, road cutting extra. Monthly bill тВ╣70-400 (domestic). Helpline: 044-4567 4567.

samples.instruction: роиро╛ройрпН роиро┐ро▓роорпН / ро╡рпАроЯрпБ ро╡ро╛роЩрпНроХ рокрпЛроХро┐ро▒рпЗройрпН. роОройрпНройрпЖройрпНрой роЪро░ро┐рокро╛ро░рпНроХрпНроХ ро╡рпЗрогрпНроЯрпБроорпН? Registration роОрокрпНрокроЯро┐ роЪрпЖропрпНро╡родрпБ?

ро╡ро╛роЩрпНроХрпБро╡родро▒рпНроХрпБ роорпБройрпН роЪро░ро┐рокро╛ро░рпНроХрпНроХ ро╡рпЗрогрпНроЯро┐ропро╡рпИ:
1. Title Verification - 30 ро╡ро░рпБроЯ Parent Document Chain - Lawyer verify
2. EC (Encumbrance Certificate) - tnreginet.gov.in - 30 years
3. Patta & Chitta - eservices.tn.gov.in/landrecords
4. TSLR Extract (FMB) - роиро┐ро▓родрпНродро┐ройрпН роЕро│ро╡рпБ
5. Tax Receipts - Property Tax paid-роЖ?
6. Approved Layout - DTCP/CMDA/RERA
7. Land Use - Agricultural/Residential?

Registration:
8. Stamp Duty: 7% + Registration: 4% = ~11%
9. Sale Deed - Lawyer-роЙроЯройрпН prepare
10. Sub-Registrar - Both parties + 2 witnesses
11. Post-Registration: Patta transfer at Taluk Office

PMAY Benefit: роорпБродро▓рпН ро╡рпАроЯрпБ - 3-6.5% ро╡роЯрпНроЯро┐ рооро╛ройро┐ропроорпН

1. e-PAN Download (Free): eportal.incometax.gov.in тЖТ Instant e-PAN, Aadhaar OTP verification, PDF download. 2. Physical Duplicate: onlineservices.nsdl.com тЖТ 'Reprint of PAN Card', роХроЯрпНроЯрогроорпН тВ╣50, 15-20 роиро╛роЯрпНроХро│ро┐ро▓рпН ро╡ро░рпБроорпН. 3. PAN Number рооро▒роирпНродрпБро╡ро┐роЯрпНроЯро╛ро▓рпН: incometax.gov.in тЖТ Know Your PAN, Name + DOB + Mobile роХрпКроЯрпБродрпНродрпБ роХрогрпНроЯрпБрокро┐роЯро┐роХрпНроХро▓ро╛роорпН

samples.instruction: Aadhaar address update online eppadi seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
Online Method (easiest):
1. Login: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
2. OTP: Registered mobile-la varum
3. Select: 'Update Address'
4. Enter new address
5. Upload document: Passport/Bank Statement/EB Bill/Rent Agreement (PDF < 2MB)
6. Pay: тВ╣50 online
7. Note URN (Update Request Number)
8. Time: 2-3 weeks-la new Aadhaar varum

Address Validation Letter (Document illaadha case):
1. myaadhaar тЖТ Address Update тЖТ 'Request for AVL'
2. Enter Verifier details (relative/friend at new address)
3. Verifier-ku letter pogum
4. Verifier consent kodutha update aagum

Apply at tnpds.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: All family members' Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate, gas connection details, photos. Types: PHH (тВ╣1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH. RI inspection, 30-45 days processing.

Online at tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in тЖТ OTR (One Time Registration). Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar, photo. Benefits: Govt job notifications, private opportunities, skill training. Renew every 3 years. Also available at District Employment Office.

рооро╛ро▒рпНро▒рпБродрпНродро┐ро▒ройро╛ро│ро┐роХро│рпБроХрпНроХрпБ TN benefits. Pension: тВ╣1,500/month (40%+ disability). Aids: Free wheelchair, hearing aid, artificial limbs, crutches. Education: Free education + special hostels. Employment: 4% reservation in govt jobs. Bus: Free travel (ordinary buses). Loan: Subsidy loan for self-employment. UDID Card: Unique Disability ID - all benefits-роХрпНроХрпБ роХроЯрпНроЯро╛ропроорпН. Apply: Social Welfare dept/Taluk office.

All Services: services.india.gov.in, Aadhaar: uidai.gov.in / myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in, PAN: incometax.gov.in, Scholarships: scholarships.gov.in, Pension: maandhan.in, PM-KISAN: pmkisan.gov.in, Ayushman Bharat: pmjay.gov.in, PMAY Housing: pmay-urban.gov.in, Education Loan: vidyalakshmi.co.in, Skill Training: pmkvyofficial.org, MUDRA Loan: mudra.org.in, Street Vendor: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in, LPG: mylpg.in, DigiLocker: digilocker.gov.in

Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org with ownership proof (sale deed/rent agreement), Aadhaar, building certificate. Inspection by TANGEDCO. Charges: Deposit тВ╣500-15,000 based on load. Time: 7-15 days. Agricultural connection: FREE electricity for farming.

1. GST registration (above тВ╣40 lakh turnover) 2. Trade License: Municipality/Gram Panchayat 3. Shop & Establishment Act: tnlabour.tn.gov.in 4. FSSAI License (food business): fssai.gov.in 5. Fire Safety Certificate (large shops)

Collateral-free business loan from any bank. Shishu: up to тВ╣50,000, Kishore: up to тВ╣5 lakh, Tarun: up to тВ╣10 lakh. Apply at bank or mudra.org.in with business plan, ID proof, address proof. Interest: 8-12%. Good for starting/expanding small business.

samples.instruction: Aadhaar biometric lock eppadi seyvadhu? Yen seiyyanum?
samples.current_output:
Yen Lock seiyyanum:
- Yaarum unga Aadhaar misuse seiyya mudiyaadhu
- Fake SIM, fake bank account open panna mudiyaadhu
- Only you can unlock when needed

Eppadi Lock seyvadhu:
1. Go to: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
2. Login: Aadhaar + OTP
3. Click: 'Lock/Unlock Biometrics'
4. Select: 'Lock'
5. Confirm: Done!

Unlock seiyya:
- Same process, 'Unlock' select
- Temporarily unlock for specific use
- Auto re-lock option available

Virtual ID (VID) - Better option:
1. myaadhaar тЖТ VID Generator
2. 16-digit temporary number kidaikum
3. Aadhaar-ku badhila VID kodukalam
4. Anytime new VID generate pannalam

samples.instruction: Naan Tuition Center / Coaching Institute thodanga virumburen. Enna permission vendum?
samples.current_output:
**Coaching Center Permissions:**

**Basic Requirements:**
1. **Shop & Establishment** - tnlabour.tn.gov.in (тВ╣500-1,500)
2. **Trade License** - Corporation (тВ╣1,000-5,000)
3. **Fire Safety NOC** - If 50+ students
4. **Building Safety** - Structural certificate

**Large Institute Additional:**
5. **Trust/Society Registration** - If structured entity
6. **GST** - If turnover > тВ╣20 lakh
7. **PF/ESI** - If employees

**Staff:** Qualified teachers, Background verification

**Infrastructure:** Ventilation, Drinking water, Toilets, Space

**Timeline:** Basic 2-4 weeks, Large 1-2 months

**No special license for:** IAS/JEE/NEET coaching, Language classes, Computer training

samples.instruction: Free laptop scheme-роХрпНроХрпБ роОрокрпНрокроЯро┐ apply роЪрпЖропрпНро╡родрпБ?
samples.current_output: Tamil Nadu-ро▓рпН government school 11th, 12th students-роХрпНроХрпБ free laptop scheme роЙрогрпНроЯрпБ. Separate application родрпЗро╡рпИропро┐ро▓рпНро▓рпИ, school роорпВро▓роорпН automatically рокрпЖро▒ро▓ро╛роорпН. Aadhaar linking роХроЯрпНроЯро╛ропроорпН.

samples.instruction: роиро╛ройрпН Online-ро▓рпН Products ро╡ро┐ро▒рпНроХро┐ро▒рпЗройрпН. GST Registration роОрокрпНрокрпЛродрпБ роХроЯрпНроЯро╛ропроорпН? роОрокрпНрокроЯро┐ register роЪрпЖропрпНро╡родрпБ?
samples.current_output:
**GST Registration for E-commerce:**

**роОрокрпНрокрпЛродрпБ роХроЯрпНроЯро╛ропроорпН?**

| Category | Threshold |
|----------|----------|
| Goods (Inter-state) | тВ╣0 - Immediately! |
| Goods (Intra-state) | тВ╣40 lakh turnover |
| Services | тВ╣20 lakh turnover |
| E-commerce Seller | тВ╣0 - Immediately! |

**E-commerce-ро▓рпН ро╡ро┐ро▒рпНро▒ро╛ро▓рпН:**
- Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, etc.
- Turnover limit роЗро▓рпНро▓рпИ
- роорпБродро▓рпН sale-роХрпНроХрпБ роорпБройрпНройрпЗ GST ро╡рпЗрогрпНроЯрпБроорпН!

**Registration Process:**

**Step 1: gst.gov.in**
1. Services тЖТ Registration тЖТ New Registration
2. Part A: PAN, Mobile, Email verify
3. TRN (Temporary Reference Number) роХро┐роЯрпИроХрпНроХрпБроорпН

**Step 2: Part B - Details**
1. Business Information
2. Promoter/Partner details
3. Principal place of business
4. Additional place (if any)
5. Goods/Services categories
6. Bank account details
7. Document upload

**Step 3: Documents**
- PAN Card
- Aadhaar Card
- Business Address Proof:
  - Own: Electricity Bill + Property Tax
  - Rent: Rent Agreement + NOC from owner
- Bank Statement / Cancelled Cheque
- Photo (Passport size)
- Digital Signature (Partnership/Company)

**Step 4: Verification**
- Aadhaar OTP / EVC
- Or: Physical verification by officer

**Step 5: GSTIN Issue**
- Time: 3-7 working days
- 15-digit GSTIN
- Certificate download

**Fee:** FREE (No government fee)

**After Registration:**
1. Issue GST invoices
2. Collect GST from customers
3. File monthly returns (GSTR-1, GSTR-3B)
4. Pay GST by 20th of next month

**Composition Scheme:**
- Turnover < тВ╣1.5 Cr
- Pay 1% tax (instead of regular)
- No input credit
- Quarterly return
- Not for e-commerce sellers!

**Penalties (no registration):**
- 10% of tax due or тВ╣10,000 (whichever higher)
- Serious offense: Imprisonment possible

House construction assistance for rural poor. Amount: тВ╣1.20 lakh (plain) / тВ╣1.30 lakh (hilly). Selection from SECC 2011 data. Check eligibility at pmayg.nic.in. If not in list: Appeal at Gram Panchayat. Additional: MGNREGA wages, toilet under SBM. Total: тВ╣1.5 lakh+

samples.instruction: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) роОройрпНро▒ро╛ро▓рпН роОройрпНрой?
samples.current_output: Organic Farming роКроХрпНроХрпБро╡ро┐рокрпНрокрпБ родро┐роЯрпНроЯроорпН. Cluster: 50+ ро╡ро┐ро╡роЪро╛ропро┐роХро│рпН роЪрпЗро░рпНроирпНродрпБ 50 роПроХрпНроХро░рпН. Support: тВ╣50,000/hectare (3 ро╡ро░рпБроЯродрпНродро┐ро▓рпН) - Organic inputs, certification, marketing. PGS Certification: Participatory Guarantee System - free organic certification. Benefit: Premium price for organic produce, export opportunity, soil health improvement. Join: Agriculture Department, Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Training: Organic farming techniques, composting, bio-pesticides.

Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in тЖТ Link Aadhaar тЖТ Enter PAN and Aadhaar тЖТ OTP verify тЖТ Pay тВ╣1,000 late fee. SMS method: Send 'UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN>' to 567678. MANDATORY - unlinked PAN becomes inoperative!

Important TN Government Portals: tn.gov.in (TN Govt main), tnpds.gov.in (Ration/PDS), cmchistn.com (Health Insurance), tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in (Employment), bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC Welfare), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST Welfare), tnhb.tn.gov.in (Housing Board), tangedco.gov.in (Electricity), tnreginet.gov.in (Registration), serviceonline.gov.in (e-Sevai). Mobile: UZHAVAN (Farmers), TNeGA (e-Governance).

Cannot be done online for security reasons. Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra (ASK) with original Aadhaar and new active SIM. Biometric verification required. Fee: тВ╣50. Update is immediate with SMS confirmation.

guidelines:

- Keep website URLs and scheme acronyms in English
